entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledAttribute #103105
  • Incorrect X509Certificate being generated on ubuntu:20.04 with mono #103102
  • SslStream not working with ephemeral keys #103101
  • NopPromptTemplateFactory? #103090
  • Add PersistedAssemblyBuilder tests to cover input and boundary cases #103086
    9.0.0
  • NoWorkload-NoWebcil-ST-Wasm.Build.Tests.WorkItemExecution #103084
  • NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 9.0. #103083
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.JSDelay_ContinueWith_Sync test failed #103080
  • LSRA TP analysis for allocateRegisterMinimal #103079
  • Arm64 SVE: Use mask versions of instructions where possible. #103078
  • ARM64 branch out of range #103073
  • Unoptimal hash code combine in TypeHashingAlgorithms.ComputeMethodHashCode #103070
  • What is needed to add support for a new Native AOT platform? #103065
    Future
  • Blazor DLL -> WASM file extension change causing functionality failure when updating to .Net 8 #103071
  • CI timeout in System.Data.Tests.DataTableReadXmlSchemaTest.XsdSchemaDeserializationIgnoresLocale #103062
  • [wasm][chrome] Unable to evaluate script: disconnected: unable to send message to renderer #103061
  • [wasm] ystem addon update list error SyntaxError: XMLHttpRequest.open: 'http://%(server)s/dummy-system-addons.xml' is not a valid URL. #103060
  • error MSB3971: The reference assemblies for ".NETFramework,Version=v8.0" were not found #103059
  • WasmTestOnChrome-* test failures #103057

Closed

  • Reduce the number of thread requests further in the thread pool and from async IO completion dispatchers #93028
    9.0.0
  • ARM64 Vector2 multiplication breaks in .NET 8 #98137
    8.0.x
  • JIT generates incorrect optimised code in .NET 8 #98748
    8.0.x
  • ILVerify falsely reports a field being modified #102997
    Future
  • DbgEnableMiniDump does not work with PublishSingleFile #101957
    9.0.0
  • .NET connectivity issue, outbound connection timeout #103017
  • NamedPipeServerStream.EndWaitForConnection throws SocketException on x86/Linux #25615
    9.0.0
  • Make System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher cross-plattform (Linux/macOS support) #102601
  • RuntimeHelpers.IsReferenceOrContainsReferences should be `where T : allows ref struct` #102847
    9.0.0
  • Http tests hanging: ProxySetViaEnvironmentVariable_DefaultProxyCredentialsUsed #31380
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.PipeTests.CancelPendingFlushDuringBackpressureThrows #102532
  • Configuration Binding inconsitent handling of initial values for unset options #94814
    9.0.0
  • profiler\multiple test failed #100114
    9.0.0
  • terminate called after throwing an instance of 'PAL_SEHException' #103063
  • Does mono support partially aot partially interpreted runs #99807
  • Discrepancy between OTel semantic conventions and built-in System.Net metrics #97395
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.AcceptConnectionAsync_ListenerDisposed_Throws #85371
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #87552
    9.0.0
  • Corrupting exceptions are not turned into fail fasts #103018
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the new lock type in TimerQueue #103104
    area-System.Threading
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • JIT: Build and consume FMA node operands in standard order #103100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable layout traversal in LSRA by default #103099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/SVE: Implement ConvertToInt32 and ConvertToUInt32 for float #103098
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Remove some uses of #if BIGENDIAN #103097
    needs-area-label
  • Implement `JsonSerializerOptions.RespectRequiredConstructorParameters` #103096
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Minor cleanup of the Vector64/128/256/512 implementations to improve fallbacks #103095
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • JIT: Added SVE `Prefetch*` APIs. #103094
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [browser] use system Python when building on a Mac #103093
    area-Build-mono
  • Don't run the new System.Net.ServerSentEvents test with NAOT #103092
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Set csharp_indent_case_contents_when_block to false #103091
    needs-area-label
  • Use new templates to enable internal sources #103089
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Upgrade to CMake 3.26 #103088
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Prototype an aggressive SSA-based dead code elimination phase #103087
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Postdominance #103082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #103076
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Start running pri1 tests on native AOT #103069
    needs-area-label
  • Fix usage function in build-android-rootfs.sh #103067
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve performance of interface method resolution in ILC #103066
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    needs-area-label
  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR and NativeAOT #103055
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Add three-stage enqueuer/dispatcher scheme to SocketAsyncEngine, ThreadPoolWorkQueue and ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue #100506
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Fix shadow stack handling during exception handling #103047
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #92958 and #93082 #103044
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Tiny improvement of `StringBuilder.Append(StringBuilder)` #101020
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement Compute*BitAddresses APIs #103040
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Implement IAlternateEqualityComparer support for Dictionary, HashSet, ConcurrentDictionary #102907
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Update references to dotnet/installer repo #103077
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-staging] Support building against clang 18 #102529
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, source-build, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Use the new lock in CoreLib #103085
    area-System.Threading
  • Change Vector2/3/4, Quaternion, Plane, Vector<T>, and Vector64/128/256/512<T> to be implemented in managed where trivially possible #102301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't run the new Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators test with n… #103074
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove `TSNC_CLRCreatedThread` and `TSNC_InsideSyncContextWait` #103056
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert `RuntimeHelpers.IsReferenceOrContainsReferences` to JIT intrinsic #103010
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Rewrite the corehost CMake system to be more "Modern CMake"y and less MSBuild-y #102475
    area-Host
  • enable ProxySetViaEnvironmentVariable_DefaultProxyCredentialsUsed test #103051
    area-System.Net, disabled-test, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Saturating*ByActiveElementCount #102994
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Improve Json flushing #103015
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 4 #102921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Better createdump error message for single-file apps for heap or triage dump types. #102959
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Change tags parameter in Activity.AddException to be `in` parameter. #103009
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.TransposeEven/Odd() #103068
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Remove cached cgroup values #102971
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix compiling methods with explicit this #103045
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Baseline failing JIT/Regression pri1 tests #103046
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix handling of corrupting state exceptions #103048
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Tweaks for renting buffer from the array pool in INumberBase #102755
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Revert "Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders" #102986
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove noisy test #102610
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • zlib-ng: Remove a few more files that are not needed for building #103054
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Update osx-arm64, osx-x64, and linux-arm Helix queues #103053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • [workload] Use the same naming as net9 workload #103049
    area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [workloads] Add net current to current names to make them match in net10 #103050
    area-Workloads
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2467655 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Enable sending activation to dispatch queue threads #102887
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Fix emsdk check #103027
    area-Build-mono
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Avoid a few allocations in StringContent #103008
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • refactor: rename COMPlus classes to make a clear distinction with COM interop #102922
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable CET shadow stack compatibility in `apphost`/`singlefilehost` by default #103007
    area-HostModel
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add a regression test for double Content-Length header in HttpWebRequest #102989
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • [interp] handle box + brtrue/brfalse pattern for byreflike types #103052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` structs #102717
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Tensor validations, scope changes, and TensorPrimitives methods #103005
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move Disposal of QuicStream to the Http3Connection Prototype #102597
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Fix `SwiftError` variable offset calculation #103043
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #103006
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't query for negotiated ALPN protocol after renegotiation on Windows #102751
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add Base64Fuzzer to the repo #103011
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Test CI #102967
    NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Re-write Android PBKDF2 one shot in Java #103016
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][NativeAOT] Disable `MH_SUBSECTIONS_VIA_SYMBOLS` and enable `-dead_strip` by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP] Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [NO REVIEW] Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #103019
    NO-MERGE, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some failed CoreRoot R2R testcases. #103033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use clang from EMSDK directly to compile bitcode #2603

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Move dotnet.js to aotsdk #2604
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Allow to override emcc path #2602
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet format] MacOS exit status is always 0 with --verify-no-changes #41422
  • Userlocal workload installation/updates are broken in 8.0.300 #41420
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 preview 6 SDK installed, run wpf/winforms failed with error "You must install or update .NET to run this application" #41395

Closed

  • Vulnerability scan for solution fails if solution has any .esproj (JavaScript Project System, JSPS) projects #41415
  • Publishing with `win-x64` RID doesn't include runtime-specific Nuget libraries #10665
  • Can't use .NET CLI to build .vbproj with resources #12951

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove usage of `ComHostCustomizationUnsupportedOSException` #41424
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Re-bootstrap with Preview 6 SDK #41417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add 2.x installer table #41396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix minimum macOS version in the .pkg manifest #41416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use AzureLinux 3.0 containers like dotnet/runtime for the VMR #41418
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Add implementation of Aspire service #41319
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • [Blazor] Disable problematic runtime switches, same as preview5 #41412
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Delete dangling comments from exclusions file #41411
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Update .gdnbaselines with latest changes #41402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SDK Diff tests baselines #41400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #41383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [wasm] Import StaticWebAssets SDK only for browser-wasm #41306
    Area-WasmSdk
  • [Blazor] Fingerprint all assets #41244
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • remove installer from version file #41316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update LDM agenda #8189
  • Update LDM agenda: better conversion from collection expression to ReadOnlySpan<T> #8188

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio won't show errors and Error list doesn't switch to code line after doubl click #73863
  • Syntax coloring broken after updating to 17.10 #73862
    17.11
  • Potential source breaking changes due to params collection #73857
    17.12
  • Collection expressions: Suboptimal codegen when concatenating static lists #73856

Closed

  • Rename does not work for C# class name in VS 17.9.6 #73582
  • Intellisense hover for suggestions, missing assembly references not working #73584
  • Visual Studio only detects problems on build #73585
  • Automatic line wrapping, taking into account the specified formatting and language syntax. #73671
  • "Quick Actions and Refactorings" should include suggesting changing the existing declaration to "public" as a proposed fix for error CS0737 #73664
  • Collection Expression Compile Error after upgrading to SDK 8.0.3. #73761
  • Invalid implicit cast of async lambda expression to Action #73745
  • "IDE0305 Use collection expression for fluent" inconsistent between .NET 8.0.204 and 8.0.300 despite explicit analyzer package dependency #73639
  • Force Type Convert QuickAction Bug #73211
  • Suppressing one IDExxxx rule from a multi-rule EditorConfig setting is not possible if EnforceCodeStyleInBuild is enabled #73858
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35004.137 #73853

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore workspaces that do not have IEditAndContinueWorkspaceService #73861
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Rename the interval tree types. #73860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Share the majority of code between the Binary and Flat-Array versions of our interval trees. #73859
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Introduce an interval tree implementation backed by an array. #73855
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73825
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Code style options cleanup #73744
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update version for system.data.sqlclient to 4.8.6 #73845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce project forks on solution open #73839
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix build host when only the .net 6 SDK is installed #73818
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion #73844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to workspace service to ensure the analyzer loader uses streams on linux #73809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update MicrosoftDevDivOptimizationDataPowerShellVersion to 1.0.803 #73841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add tsx/jsx as recognized extensions for TS #73852
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use EnableCodeStyleSeverity instead of AnalysisLevel to control new diagnostic severity behavior #73843
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use a serialization compatible marker #73851
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Fix build warnings observed locally #73593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delay reporting of pattern-based using diagnostics #73850
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json_middleware, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, updates #56090
  • Perf regression: fortunes, https, json #56089
  • Perf improvement: mvc #56088
  • Blazor form bindings does not work when property has non latin characters #56082
    9.0-preview7

Closed

  • SetLockoutEnabledAsync confusing comments #56061
    Backlog
  • blazor.web.js is deprecated for pagespeed Lighthouse #56081
  • Add query string to dotnet.js to fix Blazor displaying blank page after framework upgrade #56054
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication make possible to configure options in AuthenticationBuilder by dependencies from IServiceProvider #56044

PullRequests

Created

  • Unquarantine `HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval` #56091
    area-infrastructure
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update sdk daily builds table url #56085
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update AuthenticationSchemeProvider.cs public constructor summary punctuation #55919
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Quarantine the flakiest IIS tests #55938
    area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Move schema store into service and add schema keys #56084
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Fix SetLockoutEnabledAsync comments #56062
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Add codefixer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Annotate SignalR client for native AOT #56079
    area-signalr, NativeAOT
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove dot that is added to URL #56075
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Experimental revert of P/Invoke layer #55519
    feature-httpsys, area-networking
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24302.3 #56034
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor
  • Unquarantine HtmlGenerationWithCultureTest.CacheTagHelper_VaryByCultureComposesWithOtherVaryByOptions #55858
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • gRPC JSON transcoding + Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi #56067
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Understanding metrics and memory usage of a .net app (seem mostly consume by cache and fragmentation) #4697
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Change SOS breaking change from warning to error; better dotnet-dump target errors #4713

Updated

  • Implement CLRMA interfaces on top of DAC APIs #4667

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using Shell, more than 5 tabs works until navigating to another tab bar and back. #22875
  • Animated GIFs do not load in older Android (27 and below) #22872
  • Setting a Style With TargetType="Border" Faults at Run Time #22862
  • Unable to control SafeArea of a ContentPage which is inside of a shell #22858
  • ObjectDisposedException (thrown when app is reloaded/resumed from background during debugging): Cannot access a closed Stream #22855
  • CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate cannot be clicked #22849
  • Controls slides down when using frame in scrollview and keyboard gets focused. (Happens in iOS only) #22848
  • Narrator is not announcing the status message as result found when results are found and visible status message when result is not fond for search recipe edit filed : A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_Search box_screen reader #22845
    .NET 8 SR7
  • When keyboard focus moves to "1 scallion" checkbox keyboard focus is overlapping the label of check box: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes Recipe_Recipe Screen_Usability #22843
    Backlog

Closed

  • LineBreakMode="WordWrap" leaves extra space on Android #22853
  • Using radiobuttons in a group, pressing one button works fine, but pressing the seconf button does not reset the first hence "blocks" the radio buttons all together. #22750
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Page-level memory leak in NavigationPage on iOS #20119
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Label HtmlText should support sub and sup #22837
  • How can I listen to the buttons on the Android TV remote control? #22846
  • Disappearing UI in CollectionView on Scrolling (Andriod) #22847
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Proposal] Compiling typed bindings using source generators #20574
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Proposal] Add a new public API to allow defining TypedBinding in code #19912
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Port Forms Animation/Power Save test #16511
  • Button/ImageButton RippleEffect not working in some cases #22603
    .NET 8 SR6
  • MAUI Project template improvements #22813

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix animated gifs in Release builds #22874
  • Add DarkTheme style for Frame #22871
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    community ✨
  • Fixed all remaining CA1416 errors #22868
  • iOS Entry & Editor Placeholder font follows FontFamily property #22864
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22861
  • [tests] Try a newer xunit #22860
  • Enable Binding inteceptors source generator by default #22856
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
  • [Windows] Avoid crash doing Application.Current.CloseWindow of hidden Window #22852
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window

Merged

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells #22867
    memory-leak 💦
  • [Windows] Subscribe less pointer events in `UpdatingGestureRecognizers` #22781
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [ios/catalyst] fix leak in NavigationPage #22810
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] Fix RadioButton selection in Group #22787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22840
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Fix maestro #22857
  • Make sure ImageButton always has a background #22717
    area-controls-button
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22841
    area-infrastructure
  • Update project & solution templates #22816
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-templates

Updated

  • Optimize converters for GridLength, ColumnDefinition, and RowDefinition #20048
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize getting default font size and font family values #22782
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Essentials] Add DateTimeOffset overload in Preferences #22815
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • [Android] TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage does not fit all screen #22836
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fixes endless loop of HorizontalScroll #22628
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TPH: SQL for persisting property that references collection of derived types is performed alphabetically instead of respecting the collection order #33918
  • Use DbContext in a Migration #33917
  • Ensure FTS and other optional requirements for dev flow are tested on the C.I. #33916
  • EF adds object instance to navigation property when object instance is deleted #33914
  • Trying to save a non-scalar nested JSON collection (List<List<X>>) saves incorrect data #33913
  • Opt-out from retry strategy on PostgreSQL #33912
  • Cannot use an interceptor with NetTopologySuite.EF for MSSQL #33910
  • Cosmos NativeAOT support #33909
    Backlog
  • Validate that all properties in JSON types have a JsonValueReaderWriter #33907
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cosmos: remove null semantics compensation for InExpression #31063
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Non-generic Find/FindAsync on DbContext is not translated to ReadItem #33881
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos DB: Find/FindAsync performs SQL API query when entity has embedded entities #24202
    9.0.0
  • Issue with Generating Migrations for Multiple Indexes with Different Filters #33911
  • Convert.ToInt32 could not be translated when argument is user-defined function #30818
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: bad SQL generated when projecting out "Value" #33858
    9.0.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable internal feed and runtime usage via templates #33919

Merged

  • Generate KeyValueFactory and related instances in the compiled model. #33887
  • Update FTS baselines #33915
  • Cosmos: translate Contains over subquery #33905
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33902
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Remove unneeded Cosmos 3-value logic compensation for InExpression #33899
  • Cosmos: use ReadItem for more Find cases #33896
  • Revert broken validation for JSON properties with no JsonValueReaderWriter #33908
  • Add support for `object` in `SqlServerConvertTranslator` #33891
    community-contribution
  • Clean up container management in Cosmos #33898
  • Work on Cosmos primitive collections, subquery and general query infra #33895
  • Various stuff from EFCore.PG JSON work #32255

Updated

  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747
  • When creating the "missing column" error message, use the same (case insensitive) column name comparer used in field value retrieval #33749
  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • OTEL implementation, so far matching EventCounters infrastructure. #33633
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900
  • Fix SQL Server translation of `IndexOf` #33876
